name: TezCasino - Tezos Lotto (EVERYONE WINS!)
description:
Welcome to the TezCasino!
This collection is a lottery featuring 50 tickets where EVERYONE is a WINNER!
Each ticket costs 4tez and everyone will receive a random loot DesktopPunk(costs 5tez currently) and one winner will receive a random loot DesktopPunk AND 30tez!

How to enter the lottery:
1.) Buy a lottery ticket here for 4tez!
2.) Send all your lottery tickets to our burner address: tz1MPpPcEvR5wFLx2dyAvfcz4bqyBqqEwRes
3.) Wait for all other tickets to be bought!
4.) Winner will be announced on Twitter: @Kakashi_tez and on Discord: discord.gg/wwm8Vd2k9R


Feel free to DM @Kakashi_tez on Twitter with any questions or concerns and join our discord: discord.gg/wwm8Vd2k9R!

Good luck to all participants and enjoy yourself at the TezCasino!
